name: Professional Banking Credit Card
shortDescription: Get the line of credit you want (up to 3 times your monthly income) at a preferential interest rate. Benefits include unlimited local and 10 international airport lounge visits, plus many more lifestyle perks.

productPricing.description: R84 pm | with the Professional Pay-as-you-use Account~ Free | with the Professional Bundle or Young Professional Bundle

eligibilityNote: This card is available only with one of Nedbank's Professional Banking current accounts. If you already have a Professional Banking account, please continue with this application.
additionalInfo: A personalised credit facility with up to 55 days interest-free.
Issued with both Visa Signature and American Express for the widest range of travel and lifestyle perks and maximum Greenbacks.
Visa Signature offers over R10 million travel insurance and double warranties on purchases, plus unlimited local and 10 international airport lounge visits.
American Express offers double Greenbacks should you enrol onto the Greenbacks Card Swiper program (free for the Professional Bundle).
Free replacement cards should they be lost or stolen.
salesHighlights: sh1~A banking package that works as hard as you do
sh2~Lifestyle perks for the entire family
sh3~Unique investments to suit your lifestyle
sh4~Finance that lets you dream big
sh5~Ways to bank that suit your hours
sh6~Tailored offering for young professionals and those over 54

applicationSteps.name: Authenticate
applicationSteps.Description: Register to log in with your Nedbank ID.

applicationSteps.name: Product setup
applicationSteps.Description: Setup your product to suit your needs.

applicationSteps.name: About you
applicationSteps.Description: Tell us more details about you.

applicationSteps.name: Credit info
applicationSteps.Description: Only required if you need a credit facility.

applicationSteps.name: Finalisation
applicationSteps.Description: Upload documents and accept some T&Cs.

applicationSteps.name: Customisation
applicationSteps.Description: Choose your banker and card delivery.

eligibilityRules.description: All credit facilities are subject to credit and affordability checks.

requiredDocuments.description: card/document or passport with valid permit
(we can source these for you from most banks)
for overdraft and credit card applications, additional documents may be required

productFeatures.name: Age
productFeatures.description: Individuals over the age of 18 years

productFeatures.name: fee
productFeatures.description: R80 pm with the Professional Pay-as-you-use Account. Free with the Professional Bundle or Young Professional Bundle

productFeatures.name: income
productFeatures.description: No minimum income is required however, this offering is ideally suited to those earning over R750 000 per year.

productFeatures.name: repayment
productFeatures.description: Enjoy up to 55 days interest free, and a minimum monthly repayment of 5%. We offer a budget facility for larger purchases (choose to repay over 3, 6, 12, 24 or 36 months).

productFeatures.name: cashback
productFeatures.description: Greenbacks Rewards

productFeatures.name: earnrate
productFeatures.description: Earn 2 Greenbacks for every R5.00 spent on Amex and 1 Greenback for every R5.00 spent on Visa Signature

productFeatures.name: loyaltyprogram
productFeatures.description: Greenbacks Rewards

productFeatures.name: internationallounges
productFeatures.description: Cardholders are entitled to an annual allocation of complimentary lounge visits at more than 800 LoungeKey lounges globally. Visa Signature cardholders get 10 visits (including 1 guest per visit).

productFeatures.name: companionticket
productFeatures.description: N/A

productFeatures.name: prioritypassmembership
productFeatures.description: N/A

productFeatures.name: localairportlounge
productFeatures.description: Unlimited local airport lounge visits when departing via the local or international Bidvest airport lounges in SA.

productFeatures.name: travelinsurance
productFeatures.description: Pay for your flights using your credit card and automatically get medical emergency cover (American Express up to R3 million and Visa Signature up to USD750 000).

productFeatures.name: elitetiermemberships
productFeatures.description: N/A

productFeatures.name: travelservicesdesk
productFeatures.description: Online Nedbank Travel Portal with exclusive offers

productFeatures.name: diningwineanddine

productFeatures.description: No

productFeatures.description: 24hr Global Visa Concierge Services.View latest offers for Visa Signature at https://visacards.africa/offers

productFeatures.description: N/A

productFeatures.name: concierge
productFeatures.description: 24hr Global Visa Concierge Services: Flight, hotel & restaurant reservations; car rental reservations, event ticket purchases, trip planning and other general requests.

productFeatures.name: purchaseprotection
productFeatures.description: Extended purchase protection and double warranty for purchases using your Visa Signature Card.

productFeatures.name: fraudprotection
productFeatures.description: 24hr Global Cardholder Assistance Services: If your Visa card has been lost or stolen, Emergency Assistance Services representatives can assist with emergency card replacement, cash disbursement and payment authorisations.

productFeatures.name: freecardreplacement
productFeatures.description: Free replacement cards should they be lost or stolen.
